action.des: Brian Barton remains in the game as the left fielder.
Joe Mather remains in the game as the center fielder.

atbat.des: Ryan Doumit singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Joe Mather.

pitch.cc: Kyle McClellan went back to the sinker even though Ryan Doumit hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Adam LaRoche singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Joe Mather. Ryan Doumit to 2nd.
Jason Michaels hits a sacrifice bunt. Ryan Doumit to 3rd. Adam LaRoche to 2nd. Jason Michaels to 1st.
Andy LaRoche reaches on force attempt, missed catch error by catcher Yadier Molina, assist to second baseman Felipe Lopez. Ryan Doumit scores. Adam LaRoche to 3rd. Jason Michaels to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Kyle McClellan shows faith in Yadier Molina by throwing the slider in the dirt.

atbat.des: Steve Pearce walks. Adam LaRoche scores. Jason Michaels to 3rd. Andy LaRoche to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Kyle McClellan went back to the sinker even though Steve Pearce hit for a single last time up.
Dangerous count for Kyle McClellan; Steve Pearce is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .554 OPS against them and .588 against everything else.

atbat.des: Luis Rivas flies out to center fielder Joe Mather. Jason Michaels scores. Andy LaRoche to 3rd. Throwing error by center fielder Joe Mather.

pitch.cc: Kyle McClellan shows faith in Yadier Molina by throwing the curveball in the dirt.
Kyle McClellan has Pirates batters hitting the ball into the ground so far.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Chris Gomez replaces Denny Bautista.
Pitcher Change: Ron Villone replaces Kyle McClellan, batting 8th.

atbat.des: Chris Gomez pops out to shortstop Cesar Izturis.

pitch.cc: Ron Villone is trying to tie up Chris Gomez with fastballs inside, where Chris Gomez hits .360.
Ron Villone battled back from 3-0 to retire Chris Gomez.
Ron Villone is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Sam Holbrook.

action.des: Pitcher Change: John Grabow replaces Denny Bautista, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Troy Glaus flies out to center fielder Nyjer Morgan.

pitch.cc: John Grabow battled back from 3-0 to retire Troy Glaus.

action.des: With Felipe Lopez batting, Ryan Ludwick advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.

atbat.des: Felipe Lopez grounds out sharply, shortstop Jack Wilson to first baseman Adam LaRoche.

pitch.cc: John Grabow went back to the four-seam fastball even though Felipe Lopez hit for a single last time up.
Felipe Lopez may sit on the changeup here, since John Grabow would rather go after him than on-deck hitter Joe Mather.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jason LaRue replaces Ron Villone.
Pitcher Change: T. J. Beam replaces John Grabow, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Adam Kennedy replaces Jason LaRue.

atbat.des: Adam Kennedy singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Jason Michaels. Ryan Ludwick scores. Yadier Molina to 2nd.

pitch.cc: T.J. Beam is trying to tie up Adam Kennedy with fastballs inside, where Adam Kennedy hits .383.
T.J. Beam had Adam Kennedy down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Cesar Izturis walks. Yadier Molina to 3rd. Adam Kennedy to 2nd.

pitch.cc: T.J. Beam is trying to tie up Cesar Izturis with fastballs inside, where Cesar Izturis hits .302.
T.J. Beam shows faith in Ryan Doumit by throwing the slider in the dirt.
